name: GiftPicker
description:
Climate change is forcing polar bears to go hunting for food in peculiar places. One day the Polar bear Barry comes by a big building with sounds coming from the inside. He steps in to a sight he didn’t expect .

Credits: 

3D toys - Psionic Games

Dark Fantasy kit - Runemark Studio

Rpg Fantasy (Pack) - Maksim Bugrimow 

Christmas Toy - Deployer 

Music and Gift sound - https://mixkit.co/ 

Voice Actor - Daniel Lerche 

End screen - Pixabay
